■Put the nuggets in the basket
on the mesh tray (one bag is a
full run).

■You don't have to fill the
basket evenly with nuggets, but
be sure that every piece is in
the oil when the basket goes
into the frier.

■When using the 1/2 UHC tray, a
full basket makes a full bag.
With the 1/3 UHC tray, use a
half-basket to make half-bags.

■Shake the basket to make sure
the nuggets are positioned
correctly. You may need to do
this manually for some.
